fullplot: An underachieving vocal coach is motivated by her father, the king of movie-trailer voice-overs, to pursue her aspirations of becoming a voiceover star. Amidst pride, sexism and family dysfunction, she sets out to change the voice of a generation.
plot: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protègè.
title: In a World...

tomatoes.consensus: A funny, well-written screwball satire for film buffs, In a World... proves an auspicious beginning for writer, director, and star Lake Bell.
